message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $10,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a great asset to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $9,500 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a price closer to my initial asking price. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $9,750?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand your position, but I am still unable to meet at $9,750. I would like to offer $9,600 for the product.
